Champagne Drip Is Coming to Le Belmont in Montreal Next Weekend

Posted by Brittany Prevost on May 19, 2022

TICKETS

As we quickly approach the long weekend in Canada, many of you may already have your plans locked. But, what about the following weekend? Are you already dreaming of an event post relaxation? Well, look no further - we have just the event to satisfy your post long weekend blues!

On Saturday, May 28, 2022, Neptune Events will welcome the legendary Champagne Drip to Le Belmont in Montreal, Quebec. This will mark his debut performance in Quebec! The American producer is known for his impressive musical abilities stemming from his musical upbringing, and his extensive discography. He's undoubtedly a force to be reckoned with!

Participants can also count on special performances by BEATCORE and LVWZ. In addition, some of the hottest rising local superstars will also take the stage in support. Get ready for soon-to-be epic performances by MHOLY and KAT2KAT! Be sure to get there early, Flag fam - you won't want to miss a single set!

As you can imagine with a stacked lineup like this, tickets are already flying. Be sure to grab yours here before it's too late. We're always happy to hear your feedback, especially when it comes to a highly sought-after show and venue like this one! Send us a message via our official social media channels. See you on the dance floor...
